content: in this legal case a court in palermo has issued a final resolution regarding the dissolution of a community and the division of a property located in monreale the court has ordered the division of the property into four lots assigning each lot to the respective parties involved they have also established a right of easement for certain parcels of land and ordered one party to pay the other party a specified amount the court has addressed a counterclaim for accounting and ordered one party to pay the other party a share of the civil fruits produced by the property they have determined the ownership shares of the property and concluded that the division is feasible based on expert reports the court has also found that one party had managed the property without proper reporting and ordered them to pay a specified amount to the affected party the court has allocated the costs of the case including the division and accounting between the parties the decision was made on january 4 2022 by judge dr st sa
